thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2.arrays
Class ArrayBuffer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2.arrays.ArrayBuffer

public final class ArrayBuffer
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

The ArrayBuffer type describes a buffer used to store data for the TypedArray interface and its subclasses

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Method Detail

create

public static ArrayBuffer create(int length)
Creates a new ArrayBuffer of the given length in bytes. The contents of the ArrayBuffer are initialized to 0.

Parameters:
length - number of bytes
Returns:
the new ArrayBuffer

getByteLength

public int getByteLength()
The length of the ArrayBuffer in bytes, as fixed at construction time.
